author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Predator film franchise is headed back to theaters with the release of Predator: Badlands. However, it’s just been revealed that Predator: Badlands will also be the first mainline entry to receive a PG-13 rating, which producer Ben Rosenblatt has stepped forward to justify. Predator: Badlands director Dan Trachtenberg, who previously helmed the very R-rated [...]

The post ‘Predator: Badlands’ Producer Justifies PG-13 Rating appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Predator: Badlands’ Producer Justifies PG-13 Rating
